column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Also worth noting is that the gift shops and cafe are both quite nice
column2: and also pretty reasonably priced for a museum. They don't jack things up too much
column3: and are probably the most reasonably priced major museum in the city. The cafe is also easily the best food of any of the museum restaurants
column4: although the restaurant at the Shedd Aquarium is nothing to scoff at.
